text: ( music playing )
Ruby: There's so much to do
aboard a Disney cruise,
and Dakota and I,
we're trying to do it all.

And we came up with
an awesome challenge.
( text chimes )

This Disney cruise
has been so fun.
What are we going to do next?
Let's go meet the captain.
Cool. Meet you there.

- Captain America.
- Heya, pal.

Man, I can't believe
I'm meeting you.
Ahoy, Captain Mickey!
I'm a huge fan.
Can I get a selfie?

I'm just waiting
for my friend Dakota.
He'll be here any minute.
All right, here we go.

- Enjoying the day?
- Yes.
Any second now,
just right here.

While we're waiting,
I could ride the Aquadunk.

Okay, cool.
I'll be right back.
Bye, Mickey!
( screaming )

Oh, my gosh! Captain Mickey,
the Aquadunk was so much fun.

It was so cool.
First I was like this,
and then I was like this!

And then I was like,
"Whoo! I did it!"

- Where are you?
- Oh, wait.

Hold on.
My friend's texting me.
Um, I'm with the captain, duh.

Oh, she's with
the other captain.
( no audible dialogue )

Are you kidding me?
How many captains
does this ship have anyway?

Captain Hook,
nice to meet you.
Here we go. Ready?

My friend should
be here any minute,
but I'm a big fan.

Let me just text her
really quick.

Let me make sure
she's coming.
Uh, where are you?

- Captain Marvel!
- Hi, there.

Ruby: I'm actually trying
to find the captain

- that steers the ship.
- Good luck on your mission.
( music playing )

- What are you doing here?
- What are you doing here?

I thought you were going to
try and find the captain.

Well, I can't miss
the Marvel show.
( cheering )

Dakota: Marvel night. A bunch
of Marvel characters come out.
Spider-Man!

Spider-Man was
crawling everywhere.
Ooh! It's so crazy.

You're on a ship, and this
incredible show is happening.

- Yeah, it was so fun.
- Did you see that?

- That was so cool!
- Did you see that?
Ruby: We finally figured it out
and met the captain
that actually steers the ship.

Like, the actual,
actual captain.

- Both: Captain!
- Hi!

I'm so glad to
finally meet you.

- Yes, finally.
- Were you looking for me?

Yes, well, we've been
looking everywhere.

There's so many captains
on this ship.
You found them all?

- We found them all.
- Cool.

But now we've
finally found you,

the one that actually
steers the ship.

So what does
a captain exactly do?

I make sure, first of all,
that we go to the right place.

- Yes, of course.
- And then I go around
and make sure that everybody's

having a good time
and everybody's safe.

I have a fantastic team
to help me.

We have over
a thousand crew members,

so I have to make sure
that everything
works together very well.
What would you say to someone

who's never been on
the cruise before?

Oh, well, I would say
explore the ship.

There's so many
cool places to go.

What is so special about being
captain of the Disney Magic?
Oh, it's phenomenal.

You see the kids having fun
and the people having fun.

And you can see the magic really
going through their eyes.

How did you learn to do this?
Like, be a captain?
If you want to be a captain,

you have to study
for many years.

- A long time.
- Yeah, captain school, yes.

And then after that,
you need to do

a little bit
of sailing as well,

so you're not
right away a captain.

So of all the places that
you've been in the world,
which has been your favorite?
Most definitely Castaway Cay.

It's beautiful.
I absolutely love it.

So, who's really in charge?
You or captain Mickey?

Well, Captain Mickey,
of course. He's in charge.

Not Captain Hook.
Definitely not Goofy.

- Thank you so much, Captain.
- Oh! You need to get ready

- for the pirate party.
- Oh, yes, of course!

- Don't forget that.
- Oh, all right, yes.

- Thank you so much.
- Dakota, this way!

- That way.
- Don't get lost again.

- Yeah, here we go.
- Bye, Captain!
Bye.

Dakota: The pirate party
is so awesome!
Whoo!

Everybody dressed up
like a pirate.

Every single person
was dancing.
Ruby: So cool.

And then out of nowhere--
that's Mickey!

Ruby: Captain Mickey Mouse
flies across the ship.
Yeah! Mickey!

Dakota: Then fireworks
came off the ship.

- Yeah!
- Whoo!

Ruby: That was an experience
I'll never forget.
Dakota: It was so fun.
( music playing )

Ruby: There are so many
fun things to do

- on the Disney Magic.
- Dakota: To sum it all up,
in one word-- awesome!

To learn more about
a Disney Cruise vacation,

visit DisneyCruise.com.
You can meet all the captains,

including the newest--
Captain Minnie.
